sourcesContent:
import "./f.css" export default function f9() { return (

How to make people like you instantly

  • Make the other person feel important and do it sincerely
  • Important law of human conduct - Always make the other person feel important
  • But the very instant we break the law we shall get into constant trouble. But the very instant we break the law we shall get into constant trouble
  • The deepest craving in human nature is the craving to be appreciated
  • The life of many a person could probably change if only someone could make him feel important
  • The unvarnished truth is that almost all the people you meet feel themselves superior to you in some way and a sure way to their hearts is to let them realise in some subtle way that you recognise their importance and recognise it sincerely
  • Every man I meet is my superior in some way. In that, I learn of him
  • Talk to people about themselves and they will listen for hours
) }
